People

The AI Clinic relies on the support of the dedicated faculty and students of the University of Washington iSchool.

Bill Howe

Director

Bill Howe is the founder of The AI Clinic and an Associate Professor in the UW iSchool.

Bin Han

Member

Bin Han is a founding member of The AI Clinic and a PhD candidate in the UW iSchool.

Robert Wolfe

Member

Robert Wolfe is a founding member of The AI Clinic and a PhD candidate in the UW iSchool.

About The AI Clinic

The AI Clinic is an initiative of the UW iSchool to make language models more approachable in research.
